title: Firmware PS3 - 4.91
installation_guide: install firmware 4.91 normally after installing when rpcs3 starts compiling the firmware ppu close the app
Open the App Install ppu rpcs3 and Click on install ppu modules
Browse for the PPU FIRMWARE 4.91.zip file and select
Now a dialog should appear. You must click on select, then go to rpcs3 and click on select folder.

title: Red Dead Redemption
installation_guide: Open the Install ppu rpcs3 App and Click on install ppu modules
Select the ppu file in .zip format that you downloaded
Now a dialog should appear with some information, you must click on select, choose rpcs3 and select the folder
